Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.name: log
Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.abstract: If provided, AirImageCache will log messages to this function

Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.name: imageURLProvider
Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.abstract: An object conforming to AirImageURLProviding will allow the AirImageCache to download images from the url from the provider

Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.name: image(for:file:function:line:completion:)
Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.abstract: Checks all cache locations for a UIImage matching the key.

Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.name: save(_:for:file:function:line:)
Structs/AirImageCache.html#/s:13AirImage.abstract: Saves a provided image into the cache.

Structs/AirImageCache.html.name: AirImageCache
Structs/AirImageCache.html.abstract: AirImageCache saves and returns images from an NSCache stored in memory and in the /Caches directory.

Protocols/AirImageURLProviding.html#/s:1.name: url(for:)
Protocols/AirImageURLProviding.html#/s:1.abstract: Creates the URL to get a specified image from

Protocols/AirImageURLProviding.html.name: AirImageURLProviding
Protocols/AirImageURLProviding.html.abstract: To enable the AirImageCache to get images from a server, provide AirImageCache with an object conforming to this protocol, and implement url(for key: String) -> URL

Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.name: setAirImage(for:file:function:line:)
Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.abstract: Convenience function to set the image on a UIImageView from a key. Stores the data task on self, call cancelAirImageDownload if you want to stop the download.

Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.name: cancelAirImageDownload()
Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.abstract: Cancels the active image download, if there is one
